import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button, CardTitle, Container } from "reactstrap"; import Breadcrumbs from '../../components/Common/Breadcrumb'; class FormRepeater extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { rows: [], rows1: [] }; } handleAddRow = () => { const item = { name: "" }; this.setState({ rows: [...this.state.rows, item] }); }; handleAddRowNested = () => { const item1 = { name1: "" }; this.setState({ rows1: [...this.state.rows1, item1] }); }; handleRemoveRow = (e, idx) => { if (typeof (idx) != "undefined") document.getElementById("addr" + idx).style.display = "none"; }; handleRemoveRowNested = (e, idx) => { document.getElementById("nested" + idx).style.display = "none"; }; render() { return (
Example {this.state.rows.map((item, idx) => ( ))}

); } } export default FormRepeater;
